markdownRemark.html:
Why all the work?

Why switching to a new site generator?

Is it all just an elaborate strategy for some cultivated procrastination?

This is the amount of posts that I've written since 2004.

I was considering doing some spin doctoring how things are going downhill, and maybe they are, but one unfortunate side-effect of crossing the 30ies and then the 40ies is that I think a lot more about where to put my energy. There is a family, thinking about
